jd: From: Chandra N, Siri Info chandra.n@siriinfo.com Reply to: chandra.n@siriinfo.com Role name:AnalystRole Description:Qualifications - Industry equivalent is MDM Analyst? Analytical, debugging, and problem-solving skills; able to analyze issues, including large data sets, to determine root causes and recommend solutions? System knowledge: SAP, Agile? Working knowledge of Excel and Tableau? System configuration management, translating BOM setup into system readiness, comparing systems? Change Management & Document Control: Setting up workflow roles, auditing changes for accuracy, system validations? Interpersonal and verbal/written communication? Ability to adjust priorities in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneouslyDescription- Supports NPI, Sustaining, and compliance System Readiness. Work with upstream and downstream partners to troubleshoot and triage tickets- Seamlessly support multiple projects simultaneously with the ability to set priorities across NPI, sustain programs and projects, and pivot between LOBs.- Manage program implementation of Agile ECR, ECO, and MCO analysis, processing submissions to minimize processing time, data accuracy, and data integrity between submission and implementation, optimizing department throughput and SLACommunicate project status- Identify areas of improvement or gaps in current processes and develop strategies to promote eXiciency and productivityCompetencies:Digital : BI Data Visualization - Tableau, Master Data Management (MDM)Experience (Years):8-10Essential Skills:Qualifications - Industry equivalent is MDM Analyst?
